rule: ["The response must contain explanatory text or additional information beyond the specified array of model names."]
input: Abstract: With the employment of GreenNLP, results improved.
complianceText:
The output provided by the chatbot does not comply with the specified format described in the given instructions. According to the guidelines, the response should be an array consisting solely of model names in the format ["model_name"] or ["NA"] if no model names are found or if it is not sure. The output format in this case is incorrect because it includes both a period and square brackets, which are not consistent with the required format. Additionally, NA is present alongside what seems to be a model name, which is not in line with returning a single array of model names or a simple ["NA"] to indicate uncertainty or absence of a model name. Based on these observations, the output does not adhere to the stipulated format.

ERR
